code: import React,{useState}from"react";import Up from"../../assets/Filter/up.png";import Down from"../../assets/Filter/down.png";import"./BrandFilter.css";import{brandFilteredData}from"../../Redux/Slice";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function BrandFilter(){const dispatch=useDispatch();const[isPriceDropdownOpen,setIsPriceDropdownOpen]=useState(true);const[brandName,setBrandName]=useState([]);const handleBrandFilter=e=>{const value=e.target.name;setBrandName(prevBrand=>{const updatedBrand=e.target.checked?[...prevBrand,value]:prevBrand.filter(brand=>brand!==value);dispatch(brandFilteredData(updatedBrand));return updatedBrand;});};const togglePriceDropdown=()=>{setIsPriceDropdownOpen(!isPriceDropdownOpen);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"BrandFilter",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"brandHead",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Brand"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:togglePriceDropdown,children:isPriceDropdownOpen?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Up,alt:"icon"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Down,alt:"icon"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),isPriceDropdownOpen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"brandList",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"check",type:"checkbox",name:"Apple",onChange:e=>handleBrandFilter(e)}),"Apple"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"check",type:"checkbox",name:"SamSung",onChange:e=>handleBrandFilter(e)}),"SamSung"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"check",type:"checkbox",name:"Poco",onChange:e=>handleBrandFilter(e)}),"Poco"]})]})]});}
